item.title: Chaire of Design Jean Prouvé
item.description:
/ Inaugural lecture / 

 
/ Recent writings / La diversité dans l’enseignement du design et des métiers d’art doit faire école / Courses / Design Master Cnam·CESAAP in residence at the Academia of climate in Paris / Teaching / Research practices in design, arts and creation (DSN201) · Reflective practices (DSN202) · Structuring information (TET007) · Dialoguing (USMC85) / Events / Research seminar Mediums in design / Projects / Scuola del non sapere with Ruedi Baur and Civic City · TransFabriC at CNAM

/ Pierre Lévy / prof.dr.ing. Pierre Lévy, HDR · Professor (PRCM) at National Conservatory of Arts and Crafts, France · Holder of the Chair of design Jean Prouvé · Member of the Dicen-IDF lab (EA 7339) / Researching / My main focus is the creation of a Japanese philosophy-inspired design framework to think further the relation between design and appropriation, contributing to Transforming Practices. / Publications /
